images.copyright: Karst mountains in Guilin and Lijiang River National Park, China (© Sean Pavone/Alamy)
images.title: Misty mountain hop
images.caption: Guilin and Lijiang River National Park, China
images.desc: Mountains pierce the mist like dragon's teeth in this enchanting location. Though it may look like the setting of a fantasy story or science fiction epic, the remarkable Guilin and Lijiang River National Park is quite real.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
